title: Nations
description: A list of nations, including their leaders, colors, and other attributes.

name.title: Nation Name
name.description: The official name of the nation.

leaderName.title: Leader Name
leaderName.description: The name of the leader representing the nation. Omit for city states.

adjective.title: Leader Adjectives
adjective.description: The adjectives for the leader. Currently not in use.

personality.title: Leader Personality
personality.description: Defines the personality type of the nation's leader. See Personalities.json.

style.title: Visual Style
style.description: Modifier appended to image names for visual differentiation.

cityStateType.title: City State Type
cityStateType.description: Type of city state, if applicable. See CityStateTypes.json

outerColor.title: Outer Color
outerColor.description: The primary color representing the nation.

innerColor.title: Inner Color
innerColor.description: The secondary color representing the nation.

preferredVictoryType.title: Preferred Victory Type
preferredVictoryType.description: The victory type most favored by this nation. See VictoryTypes.json.

startBias.title: Start Bias
startBias.description: Types of tiles where the nation is more likely to start.

uniques.title: Unique Abilities
uniques.description: Special abilities or traits unique to this nation.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Text introducing the nation to the player.

tradeRequest.title: Trade Request
tradeRequest.description: Text shown when the nation requests a trade.

neutralHello.title: Neutral Greeting
neutralHello.description: Greeting text when relations are neutral.

hateHello.title: Hostile Greeting
hateHello.description: Greeting text when relations are hostile.

declaringWar.title: Declaring War
declaringWar.description: Text shown when the nation declares war.

attacked.title: Attacked
attacked.description: Text shown when the nation is attacked.

defeated.title: Defeated
defeated.description: Text shown when the nation is defeated.

denounced.title: Denounced
denounced.description: Text shown when the nation is denounced.

declaringFriendship.title: Declaring Friendship
declaringFriendship.description: Text shown when the nation declares friendship.

startIntroPart1.title: Start Introduction Part 1
startIntroPart1.description: First part of the introduction at the start of the game.

startIntroPart2.title: Start Introduction Part 2
startIntroPart2.description: Second part of the introduction at the start of the game.

cities.title: City Names
cities.description: Ordered list of city names unique to the nation, starting with the capital.

spyNames.title: Spy Names
spyNames.description: List of names for spies belonging to the nation.

favoredReligion.title: Favored Religion
favoredReligion.description: The religion most favored by this nation.

uniqueName.title: Unique Name
uniqueName.description: Decorative name for the special characteristic of this nation.

uniqueText.title: Unique Description
uniqueText.description: Freeform text shown to users, overriding the list of uniques.

civilopediaText.description: Additional descriptive text for the nation in the Civilopedia.
